name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Default Viewing Mode for Google Docs

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open Google Docs with with "Viewing" mode enabled by default.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever accidentally edited a shared Google Doc? Prevent those heart-stopping moments with this handy Chrome extension. It automatically switches your documents to "Viewing" mode the instant you open them, shielding you from unintentional changes. No setup, no hassle, just peace of mind.
